content.rendered:
Welcome to the University of La Verne! Your experience begins with Spring Orientation , which is a critical step in transitioning to life as a Leopard and acclimating to the campus community.

At Spring Orientation, you will learn more about the academic experience, campus resources, and how to enrich your experience. You’ll also meet future classmates and our Orientation leaders that are here to help provided guidance as your transition into the La Verne community.

Spring Orientation will be held on Friday, January 31st from 8:30am-12:00pm in the Abraham Campus Center, Ballrooms

Make sure to register through your Student Admitted Portal. We are excited to welcome you and get you ready for your first-year at the University of La Verne.

If you have any questions regarding Spring Orientation, please contact orientation@laverne.edu.

Leo Preview

Interested in getting to know the resources available to you as a student at the University of La Verne? Check out Leo Preview!

Learn More
First Year Learning Experience

First-Year Learning Communities—FLEX for short—are your introduction to The La Verne Experience curriculum.

Get Started
